text: Hemiarcha thermochroa is a moth of the family Gelechiidae. It is known from Australia, where it has been recorded from the Australian Capital Territory, Victoria and South Australia. The wingspan is about 15 mm. Adults have orange forewings with black spots and bands, and a black margin.lepidoptera.butterflyhouse ==References== Category:Moths described in 1893 Category:Hemiarcha
title: Hemiarcha thermochroa
